description:
11.198 prewitt
Apply prewitt operator to input video stream.

The filter accepts the following option:
name: prewitt

options.description: Set which planes will be processed, unprocessed planes will be copied. By default value 0xf, all planes will be processed.
options.name: planes

options.description: Set value which will be multiplied with filtered result.
options.name: scale

options.description: Set value which will be added to filtered result.
options.name: delta
